page.title: 19Life Styles in Cronton
page.content: {Life Styles}The quality of life of the people we questioned appears to be very good. The majority were in full time employment, financially able to support a good life style. {Entertainment}We asked 57 people how often they visited restraunts and pubs, 23 said fairly regularly, 27 said occasionally. Some travel to Liverpool or Manchester to visit the theatre. {Holidays} Of 69 households questioned 45 take holidays away from home for an average of 2 weeks. Most of these travelling abroad. Of the 69 questioned, 11 owned caravans. {Cars}In the 69 households, 83 cars were owned.
